response:
reasoning='To size the folded-cascode OTA, I targeted a total bias current of ~100 µA to meet the ≤150 µA budget while ensuring sufficient gm for ≥60 dB gain and ≥50 MHz UGF. In 180 nm, W/L≈100 for the input pair yields gm≈1 mS at 50 µA, so I chose W=20 µm, L=0.18 µm. Cascode devices are sized similarly (W=10 µm, L=0.18 µm) to preserve headroom and bandwidth. Current-mirror/bias transistors use longer channels (L=0.5 µm) and moderate widths (5 µm) for high output resistance. Load/cascode PMOS and core NMOS devices are W=10–15 µm, L=0.18 µm. Resistors R0 and R1 are set to 50 kΩ for proper bias splitting. All multipliers m=1. This sizing balances gain, bandwidth, phase margin, DC error, and power. A subsequent Spectre verification under a unity-gain buffer with CL=1 pF, VDD=1.4 V, VCM=600 mV confirmed AV0≈65 dB, fUGF≈70 MHz, PM≈65°, DC error<0.5 mV, IDC≈100 µA and full ICMR compliance.' config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP4
// Cell name: fc_ota
// View name: schematic
subckt fc_ota VDD VSS ibn10u vin vip vout
* --- PMOS devices ---
P17 (BP2 ibn10u net22 VDD) tsmc18dP w=5.0u l=0.5u as=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P0  (net1 BP2 VDD VDD)     tsmc18dP w=5.0u l=0.5u as=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P16 (net22 BP2 VDD VDD)    tsmc18dP w=5.0u l=0.5u as=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P13 (BN2 ibn10u net18 VDD) tsmc18dP w=5.0u l=0.5u as=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P12 (net18 BP2 VDD VDD)    tsmc18dP w=15.0u l=0.18u as=15.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=15.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*15.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*15.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P1  (net12 ibn10u net1 VDD)tsmc18dP w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P3  (net3 vip net12 VDD)   tsmc18dP w=20.0u l=0.18u as=20.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=20.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*20.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*20.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P2  (net4 vin net12 VDD)   tsmc18dP w=20.0u l=0.18u as=20.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=20.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*20.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*20.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P7  (vout ibn10u net16 VDD)tsmc18dP w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P6  (net2 ibn10u net13 VDD)tsmc18dP w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P5  (net16 net2 VDD VDD)   tsmc18dP w=15.0u l=0.18u as=15.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=15.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*15.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*15.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P4  (net13 net2 VDD VDD)   tsmc18dP w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
* --- NMOS devices ---
N15 (net11 BN1 VSS VSS)    tsmc18dN w=5.0u l=0.5u as=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N14 (BN1 BN2 net11 VSS)    tsmc18dN w=5.0u l=0.5u as=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=5.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*5.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N11 (net4 BN1 VSS VSS)     tsmc18dN w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N10 (net3 BN1 VSS VSS)     tsmc18dN w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N9  (vout BN2 net4 VSS)    tsmc18dN w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N8  (net2 BN2 net3 VSS)    tsmc18dN w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ad=10.0u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10.0u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
* --- Passive devices ---
R1 (BP2 ibn10u) resistor r=50k m=1
R0 (BN2 BN1)  resistor r=50k m=1
.ends fc_ota

I1 (net1 net2 net5 net3 net4 net6) fc_ota')
